typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AccountDescription as string,
		ValueType as string,
		AccountKey as integer,
		ParentAccountKey as integer,
		CustomMembers as string,
		Operator as string,
		AccountType as string,
		CustomMemberOptions as string,
		ParentAccountCodeAlternateKey as integer,
		AccountCodeAlternateKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'stupidtable' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE dbo.stupidtable
	(
	 Column1 nvarchar(30),
	 Column2 nvarchar(30),
	 Column3 nvarchar(30),
	 Column4 nvarchar(30),
	 Column5 nvarchar(30)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_stupidtable
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.stupidtable
(Column1 1, Column2 2, Column3 3, Column4 4, Column5 5)
FROM 'https://prasynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/misc/employee/Samplesource.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
	CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Shared Access Signature', SECRET='?sv=2019-10-10&ss=bfqt&srt=c&sp=rwdlacupx&se=2020-07-01T10:32:09Z&st=2020-07-01T02:32:09Z&spr=https&sig=z3af4YX79EsUHGwb0nSRVWC1qOYIHfMMMb4AmVYMCoM%3D'),
	--CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Storage Account Key', SECRET='Hesp+jraWvxxoThhs5FiZegec+OTx+Guuw+g/QOZBLix+hBBPJqCNnuSbx1fpvj1BevoT08G/RnHpmEGvk6ISA=='),
	MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = ','
	--,ERRORFILE = 'https://prasynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/misc/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM stupidtable
GO

-- type your sql script here, we now have intellisenseCREATE FUNCTION PraFunction007 (@dbid int)  
RETURNS TABLE
AS
RETURN
(
SELECT
    *
FROM
   sys.databases where Database_id > @dbid 
);


select * from PraFunction007(0)

DECLARE @year INT = 2020;
DECLARE @month INT = 8;
DECLARE @SQL NVARCHAR(MAX);
SET @SQL= 'SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(BULK '+ '''' 
    + 'https://prasynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/customercases/RaviKumar/dt_year=' + CAST(@year AS VARCHAR(10))+ '/dt_month='+CAST(@month AS VARCHAR(10)) + '/*.snappy' +''''+', 
    FORMAT='+''''+'PARQUET'+''''+ ') AS [result]';

PRINT @SQL;

EXEC(@SQL);


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--NOT WORKING SCENARIOS

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://prasynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/customercases/RaviKumar/dt_year=2020/dt_month=8/*.snappy',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]



DECLARE @path VARCHAR(100);
SET @path = 'misc/employee/subheesh.parquet;'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK @path, --'https://prasynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/misc/employee/subheesh.parquet'
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
        ,DATA_SOURCE = 'prasynapsewsdatasource'
    ) AS [r];


CREATE FUNCTION Trip ()  
RETURNS TABLE  
AS  
RETURN   
(  
    SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://spatelreportingstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/spatalreportingblobcontainer/SPATELTripTravelTime/dt_year=2020/dt_month=7/dt=2020-07-02/*',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
);

SELECT * FROM TRIP()

CREATE FUNCTION PraFunction ()  
RETURNS TABLE
AS
RETURN
(
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'customercases/RaviKumar/dt_year=2020/dt_month=8/*.snappy', --'https://prasynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/misc/employee/subheesh.parquet'
        FORMAT='PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'prasynapsewsdatasource'
    ) AS [r]
);
  

  SELECT * FROM PraFunction();

CREATE FUNCTION PraFunction2 (@path nvarchar(1000))  
RETURNS TABLE
AS
RETURN
(
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK @path,
        DATA_SOURCE = 'prasynapsewsdatasource'
    ) AS [r]
);



  SELECT * FROM PraFunction2('customercases/RaviKumar/dt_year=2020/dt_month=8/*.snappy');

CREATE DATABASE ondemanddb;
 CREATE MASTER KEY;
 
 
-- Create credential that will allow user to impersonate using Managed Identity assigned to workspace
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL prasynapsews0820_wsi WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'
GO

 
-- Create external data source secured using credential
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE prasynapsews0820_ds WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://prasynapsesa0820.dfs.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = prasynapsews0820_wsi
);
GO

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'prasynapsefs0820/CustomerCases/QID10110_20200504_180316_0.parq.snappy', --'https://prasynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/misc/employee/subheesh.parquet'
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
        ,DATA_SOURCE = 'prasynapsews0820_ds'
    ) AS [r];

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'prasynapsefs0820/CustomerCases/QID10110_20200504_180316_0.parq.snappy', --https://prasynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/misc/employee/Samplesource.csv
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'prasynapsews0820_ds'
    )
WITH (
[PatientId] INT ,
[DateOfBirth] DATE,
[GenderType] VARCHAR(10),
[CreationDateUTC] DATE,
[LastUpdatedDateUTC] DATE
) AS [r]

CREATE TABLE employee
(ID INT, Name VARCHAR(25), Dept VARCHAR(50));

INSERT INTO dbo.employee VALUES (1, 'Pra', 'Support')
INSERT INTO dbo.employee VALUES (2, 'JK', 'Development')

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [service_support_analytics].[support_surveys]
( 
	[response_id] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[survey_id] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[total_time] [int]  NULL,
	[response_status] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[ticket_id] [bigint]  NULL,
	[source] [int]  NULL,
	[ct] [int]  NULL,
	[created_date] [datetime2](7)  NULL,
	[modified_date] [datetime2](7)  NULL,
	[support_experience_rating_raw] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[support_experience_rating] [int]  NULL,
	[support_experience_sentiment_raw] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[dissatisfied_reason] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[dissatisfied_reason_text_raw] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[dissatisfied_reason_text_sentiment_raw] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[satisfied_reason] [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	[satisfied_reason_text] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[satisfied_reason_text_sentiment_raw] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[open_ended_response] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[open_ended_response_sentiment_raw] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[follow_up] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[timely_help] [int]  NULL,
	[caring_reps] [int]  NULL,
	[resolution] [int]  NULL,
	[easy_access] [int]  NULL,
	[survey_source] [varchar](4000)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED INDEX 
	(
		[response_id] ASC
	)
)
GO

COPY INTO dbo.samplesourcebulk (PatientId 1, DateOfBirth 2, GenderType 3, CreationDateUTC 4, LastUpdatedDateUTC 5)
FROM 'https://prasynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/misc/employee/Samplesource.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    --,CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity')
CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Storage Account Key', SECRET='Hesp+jraWvxxoThhs5FiZegec+OTx+Guuw+g/QOZBLix+hBBPJqCNnuSbx1fpvj1BevoT08G/RnHpmEGvk6ISA=='),
	MAXERRORS = 0,
	FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
	IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
GO


SELECT * FROM dbo.samplesourcebulk

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'samplesourcebulk' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE dbo.samplesourcebulk
	(
PatientId INT,
DateOfBirth DATETIME,
GenderType VARCHAR(10),
CreationDateUTC DATETIME,
LastUpdatedDateUTC DATETIME
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO



SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://prasynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/misc/employee/Samplesource.csv', --https://prasynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/misc/employee/Samplesource.csv
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        --DATA_SOURCE = 'prasynapsesa',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
WITH (
[PatientId] INT ,
[DateOfBirth] DATE,
[GenderType] VARCHAR(10),
[CreationDateUTC] DATE,
[LastUpdatedDateUTC] DATE
) AS [r]

DROP TABLE service_support_analytics.support_surveys
CREATE TABLE service_support_analytics.support_surveys (
    response_id varchar(8000),
    survey_id varchar(8000),
    total_time integer,
    response_status varchar(8000),
    ticket_id bigint,
    source integer,
    ct integer,
    created_date datetime2,
    modified_date datetime2,
    support_experience_rating_raw varchar(8000),
    support_experience_rating integer,
    support_experience_sentiment_raw varchar(8000),
    dissatisfied_reason varchar(8000),
    dissatisfied_reason_text_raw varchar(8000),
    dissatisfied_reason_text_sentiment_raw varchar(8000),
   -- satisfied_reason varchar(8000),
    satisfied_reason_text varchar(8000),
    satisfied_reason_text_sentiment_raw varchar(8000),
    open_ended_response varchar(8000),
    open_ended_response_sentiment_raw varchar(8000),
    follow_up varchar(8000),
    timely_help integer,
    caring_reps integer,
    resolution integer,
    easy_access integer,
    survey_source varchar(8000)
 )

https://prasynapsesa0820.blob.core.windows.net/prasynapsefs0820/CustomerCases/konstantin/sampleorcfile.orc

COPY INTO service_support_analytics.support_surveys
FROM 'https://prasynapsesa0820.dfs.core.windows.net/prasynapsefs0820/CustomerCases/konstantin'
WITH (
    FILE_FORMAT = ORC_Format, CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity')
    )  

    SELECT * FROM [service_support_analytics].[support_surveys2]

source:
CREATE TABLE orcfile
USING ORC
LOCATION "abfss://prasynapsefs0820@prasynapsesa0820.dfs.core.windows.net/CustomerCases/konstantin"

%%pyspark
df = spark.sql("""
   SELECT response_id, survey_id, total_time, response_status, ticket_id, source, ct, created_date, modified_date, support_experience_rating_raw, 
   support_experience_rating, support_experience_sentiment_raw, dissatisfied_reason, dissatisfied_reason_text_raw, dissatisfied_reason_text_sentiment_raw, 
   satisfied_reason_text, satisfied_reason_text_sentiment_raw, open_ended_response, open_ended_response_sentiment_raw, follow_up, timely_help, caring_reps, 
   resolution, easy_access, survey_source FROM orcfile
""") 
display(df)
df.write.saveAsTable("support_surveys")

%%spark
val df = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM support_surveys")
df.write.sqlanalytics("prasynapsep0820.service_support_analytics.support_surveys2", Constants.INTERNAL )
